11.content: Who are you punished by?
11.title: 8 - in primary (elementary) school

choices: Boy who is treated like a girl
111.content:
Are you a boy or a girl?
If you are a boy, does your punishment include being treated like a girl?
111.title: Your mother

choices: Diapered full-time, treated like a baby at home
1111.content:
You are an 8-year-old boy named Daniel. Your mother will punish you by putting you back into diapers.

The story will begin on the next page after one last choice.

How severely are you punished?
1111.title: Boy

choices: Dressed like a girl and diapered at home
Dressed like a girl and diapered full-time, treated like a baby girl at home
Treated like a baby girl full-time
1112.content:
You are an 8-year-old boy named Daniel. Your mother will punish you by putting you back into diapers and dressing you like a girl.

The story will begin on the next page after one last choice.

How severely are you punished?
1112.title: Boy who is treated like a girl

choices: Diapered full-time, treated like a baby at home
1113.content:
You are an 8-year-old girl named Danielle. Your mother will punish you by putting you back into diapers.

The story will begin on the next page after one last choice.

How severely are you punished?
1113.title: Girl

choices: You and Emma both get spanked and diapered
Mom sends Emma home, then your diaper punisment begins
11131.content:
You are Danielle, an eight year old little girl. You're skinny, a little short for an eight year old, and have long black hair that reached far down your back. Your eyes are a very dark brown, almost black. People tended to compliment you on how cute you were. You love games, cats, movies, clothes, swimming and singing. You had a slight disdain for babyish things like dolls, although you did own a couple.

It was a big day for you, you were finally going to get to have a friend over for a sleepover! Your best friend, Emma, was going to come over for the whole weekend. Emma was rather small and skinny like you, but with shorter blonde hair that went down to her shoulders and bright blue eyes. She liked a lot of the same stuff as you and you got along very well.

Your mother looked a lot like you, tall skinny and long black hair, but with a slightly more tan complexion. She was very nice when you were good, but when you were bad she tended to get creative with her punishments.

"All rights, you two, I'm going to go out to the store for a bit. I can trust you alone, right?" Mom said.
"Oh yeah, definitely! We're going to watch a movie." You said, looking through the menus on the TV for a good one.
Mom smiled.
"All right, but you know the rules. No touching fire or sharp objects, if I'm not back by 11PM I want you in bed, and whatever you do, don't open the black door in the basement." Mom said.
"No problem, Mom!" You said with a grin.
"Okay, be good." Mom said.
Emma shrugged her shoulder.
"Black door? You never told me about that. What's in it?" Emma asked.
You laughed.
"Oh, it's just a bathroom we never use, I think. I got a glimpse in there once and I think I saw a shower. It's locked anyway, we won't get in." You said.
You proceeded to go turn on Zootopia and watch it. You'd seen it before but Emma hadn't. You were enjoying yourself, watching the rabbit police girl on her whacky adventure, but Emma's mind seemed to be going elsewhere.

"What's wrong, Emma? You aren't laughing at the funny parts." You said.
"Well... um... I can't get my mind off your basement. I gotta know what's in it now!" She said.
"Really? It's not that exciting, I think." You said.
"Aw, come on, Danielle? It could be anything in there! I gotta know!" Emma said.
You smiled. A devious, wonderful feeling that kids got when they did things they weren't supposed to came over you.
"All right, let's do it!" You said.
You paused Zootopia and headed down into the basement. It was a little creepy down there, since it was so damp and dark. You both went to the big black door, standing imposingly in front of you. You tried the handle first, and it didn't budge. Also, a strange curious scent came from it, one that made your head feel funny.
"It... it's locked." You said.
"Do you have any keys?" Emma asked.
"No, Mom keeps them on a shelf in her room. It's too high up for me to reach." You said, wishing you were a little bit taller.
You and Emma thought for a moment.
"What if we tried to poke it open? You know, take a knife and use it to turn the keys hole?" Emma said.
"Oh... Mom said not to touch sharp objects..." You said.
"Man, you are such a wimp! We're already breaking a rule, why not two?" Emma said.
"Well... Okay!" You said.
You ran upstairs and grabbed a knife from the kitchen. It didn't fit the keyhole, of course, so you were left wondering what to do for a long time.
"Well, we already tried poking it open. Why not burn it open?" You said.
"Yeah! Great idea! We'll burn it open!" Emma said.
You both ran upstairs to the kitchen and turned on the stovetop burners. You both grabbed some crumpled up paper and set them aflame. Quickly, you ran downstairs and tried to burn the door open.
"It won't catch fire! Aw man..." You groaned.

Then from the darkness of the basement, you heard your mother's voice.
"Hey! What the hell are you kids doing?" Mom screamed.
You froze and turned. Mom strode toward you and stomped out your burning wads of paper. Emma shivered with fear.
"You two broke every rule I gave you! Knives, fire, messing with the door, and it's way past 11!" Mom screamed.
"We... we just wanted to know what it was." Emma said, trying to sound innocent.
Mom unlocked the door. Inside was a partially remodeled bathroom with fresh paint on the walls.
"It's because it's got wet paint. I didn't want you messing up the paint. Oh god, what am I going to do with you two?" Mom said, exasperated.
"It... It's okay, right? We didn't get hurt so it's all good, right?" You said, a chill running up and down your spine.
Mom glared at you.
"No, you're both in really big trouble, especially you, Dani! you should know better than to play with knives and fire without my permission!" Mom screamed.
Emma was looking worried, like she was ready to cry.

What does Mom do to you?
11131.title: Diapered at home

choices: Dress Dani in babyish footie pajamas, let her cry herself to sleep
Feed Dani some drowsy medicine and keep her in just a diaper
11133.content:
Dani was not a very good little girl. In fact, she was an obnoxious brat much of the time. One day she REALLY ticked off her mother, who was growing very tired of little Danielle's behavior, by throwing a massive temper tantrum. It wasn't even over anything special, she only wanted to stay up another ten minutes before bedtime. Dani was just feeling pissy that day. The little girl was rolling on the floor screaming and crying.
"I don't wanna go to bed! I DON'T WANNA GO TO BED!" Dani screeched.
Mom remained calm, but inside something snapped.
Firmly she said, "You're going to act like a baby? Fine, I'll treat you like one."
Mom grabbed Danielle off the floor and bent the little girl over her knee. Instantly, Danielle was filled with fear.
"M... Mom? What are you doing?" Danielle said.
Mom let out a light laugh as her mind reeled with ideas.
"I told you, you're acting like a baby, so you get the baby treatment." Mom said.

Mom pulled down Danielle's pants and panties and gave her a couple of hard swats on her little butt. Danielle screamed and cried, but was no longer throwing a tantrum. She was subdued. Mom called Danielle's older sister, Stephanie in.
"Stephy! Get in here!" Mom called out.
Stephanie instantly rushed in.
"What is it, Mom?" Stephy asked.
"Watch Dani for a few minutes. She's acting like a baby so I'm going out to buy some baby things for her." Mom said.
Mom snatched away the rest of Danielle's clothes, leaving the little girl totally nude.
"M... Mom? What's going on?" Danielle asked.
"All in good time, sweetie." Mom said.
She stood the naked Danielle in a corner, facing the wall.
"Stephy, make sure your sister doesn't move. I want her in that corner when I get back." Mom said.
Stephy laughed.
"No problem, Mom." She said.

Mom went off to the store to buy some things for Danielle. Stephy pointed and laughed at the naked child and Danielle tried not to cry too much. Soon, Mom returned and began the disturbing transition into making Danielle into a baby.
First, Mom approached Danielle with a package of some kind.
"Well, first things first, we can't have our little Dani running around naked. Let's get you into a baby diaper." Mom said.
Danielle looked in wide-eyed horror as her mother took out a plastic baby diaper with little pink stars on it. She wrapped the disposable garment around Danielle's butt and crotch, and gently taped it up.
"Aw, aren't you the cutest little thing?" Mom said.
Stephy laughed mockingly and messed with Danielle's hair.
"Yeah, you're a cute little baby, aren't you?" She said.
Danielle growled. She still had a little bit of her bratty rebellious side in her. Part of her wanted to punch her mother and her jerk sister Stephy, but she knew if she did she would only be punished worse. For now, Danielle kept herself under control.

Mom began moving boxes into Danielle's room, as well as taking things out., Danielle watched in horror as her clothes were tossed into plastic bags and thrown in the basement. She even saw her bed disassembled! When everything was finished it was late in the night. Finally, Mom grabbed her diapered daughter and showed her the new room.

Danielle was horrified. Her bed was replaced by a crib and pictures of Barney were all over her room. In place of her usual toys were baby toys and her dresser was filled with baby clothes and packs of diapers.
"Little Dani, since you acted like a baby, I have decided to punish you by making you live as a baby! You will sleep in a crib, eat baby food, drink from a bottle, and of course, poop and pee in your diapers!" Mom said, laughing devilishly.
"You can't do this! It's inhumane! What about the Geneva Convention?" Danielle said.
"You don't even know what that is!" Mom laughed.
It was true. Danielle had no idea what the Geneva Convention was, or that it said nothing about babying your bratty daughter as punishment. Dani sighed and slumped her shoulders.
"Now, it's time for bed, Baby Dani. It's far FAR past your bedtime..." Mom said.
The irony that she had gotten into this mess by wanting to stay up late was not lost on little Dani. She moaned and rolled her eyes.

What does Mom do for Dani's bedtime?
11133.title: Treated like a baby full-time

choices: Mom changes Danielle's diaper and gets her dressed
111332.content:
Mom put Danielle into the oversized crib. The bars went up far above the little girl's head. She felt like she was in a prison. Mom then got out some drowsy cold medicine.
"Drink a couple spoons of this, Dani. It will help you sleep tonight." Mom said.
Danielle pout and kept her mouth closed. Mom glared at her.
"You want another spanking?" Mom said.
Danielle grunted, at herm other. Mom growled back.
"Fine, I'll make you open your mouth!" Mom said.
Mom pinched Danielle's bare nipple. She didn't even pinch very hard, she just knew it was a soft and sensitive spot for little Dani, and therefore just the right place to pinch.
"OW! OW! OW! OW! OW!" Danielle whined.
That was when Mom quickly slipped a spoon of the drowsy medicine into her daughter's mouth. Danielle gagged.
"So, we can do this the easy way, or we can do it the 'pinch your nipples' way. Come on, little baby, what'll it be?" Mom said.
A small tear escaped one of little Dani's eyes. She obediently opened her mouth. Mom fed her the drowsy medicine and patted her on the head.
"Good girl! Now rest up, little baby Dani. You have a big day ahead of you tomorrow!" Mom said.
Mom covered Danielle in a soft little yellow blanket and tucked the little diapered girl in. She gave Danielle a soft kiss on her forehead.
"Sweet dreams, little baby." Mom said.
Danielle yawned. The drowsy medicine quickly took effect, and she grew very, very sleepy.

...
...
...

Danielle awakened more than 12 hours later, very late in the day. The sleeping medicine really did a number on her. She sat up, and to her horror, she felt that her diaper was wet! She had been so wiped out she did not wake up feeling like she had to use the bathroom. The little girl yawned and stretched. Mom could hear her stirring through the baby monitor she had put in Dani's room ,and came in to see her.
"Oh, my little sleepyhead's finally up." Mom said.
Dani looked at her damp diaper.
"M... Mom..." Danielle said, ashamedly.
"What is it, baby?" Mom said.
"I... I think I..." Danielle couldn't bring herself to say it, but Mom knew exactly what she meant.
"Oh, did my baby girl have an accident? Well, I hope you get used to it because you're going to be going in your diapers a lot." Mom said.
Danielle let out a sad, humiliated sigh. She hated this baby treatment. This was one of the worst mornings of her life. Mom stifled a grin, knowing this punishment was working flawlessly. She reached in the oversized crib and helped Danielle out. Mom felt the diaper, seeing how soggy it was.
"Well, I can change your diaper, but first you need to have your breakfast." Mom said.
Danielle sighed.
"Fine, just get me out of this wet diaper." Danielle begged.

Mom took out a large baby bottle full of milk. She sat down on the floor and cradled Danielle in her arms.
"Drink up, little baby." Mom said.
Danielle obediently drank the bottle. It was actually good milk, but it tasted a little off, somehow. Mom could tell from the look on Danielle's face as she suckled the bottle. She didn't say anything until Danielle was almost done.
"Oh, Dani, I should tell you, that milk is full of drugs! You are ingesting a bunch of muscle relaxants and laxatives. The muscle relaxants make you as weak as a baby! Just think, you'll have trouble walking and might even crawl! And the laxatives will make you poop!" Mom said, with disturbing joy.
Danielle gulped down the last bit of milk as Mom said this. She looked crushed.
"I... I'm going to be weak and poop myself?" She said.
"That's right, little Dani, just like a real baby." Mom said.
Danielle let out a groan. Things seemed hopeless for her now. The thought of pooping her diaper like a baby disturbed her. Mom patted her on her tummy.
"I also put some extra fiber in there too, so you can have big baby poops in your big baby diapers! Doesn't that sound fun?" Mom said.
Danielle groaned again.

What happens next?
111332.title: Long sleep for Dani

choices: A short pink dress that doesn't go down past Dani's diaper
Just a sleeveless pink shirt that says "Baby Cutie" on it
1113321.content:
"Now, I think it's time to get you dressed, my little baby, but first we need to get you changed out of that wet diaper." Mom said.
She laid Dani down and removed the wet diaper. Mom got out some wet wipes and cleaned her up, before applying a good amount of baby powder and baby oil.

Danielle close her eyes tightly the whole time, too humiliated to watch herself like this. Worse still, she could feel the muscle relaxants already taking effect. Danielle was already a small and weak little girl, but no she felt weak as a kitten, like she could hardly lift herself up.

Finally, Mom taped up the fresh diaper, making sure it was securely tight around Danielle's little legs so it wouldn't leak. It was larger and a little thicker than the diaper Dani had worn overnight. It went up over her bellybutton and had more padding, making it harder for her to maneuver her legs. Mom gently patted Dani on the front of her diaper, which was decorated with little yellow stars.
"Aw, so cute. But w can't have you running around in just a diaper all day." Mom said.
She reached in Danielle's dresser and took out some of the new clothes. Danielle only frowned and closed her eyes. She was overtaken with shame.
"But I want people to see your diapers. How about something where we can see them?" Mom said.

What does mom pick out for little diapered Dani to wear?
1113321.title: Get Dani dressed

choices: Rip off her humiliating diaper and clothes in protest
11133212.content:
"Oh, how about this one?" Mom said.
She took out a pink sleeveless shirt that said "Baby Cutie" on it. Danielle already felt degraded enough, being forced to wear diapers and sleep in a giant crib.
"Mom... please... I don't wanna wear that..." Danielle said.
"Well, too bad, honey. You don't get to pick out what clothes you wear anymore. Now be a good baby and put this on." Mom said.
Danielle struggled, but she was too small and weak. Mom overpowered the little girl and got the shirt on her.
"Aw, so adorable!" Mom said.
She got out her phone and snapped a couple pictures. Dani tried to hide her face with her hands, but Mom pushed the little girl's arms apart so she could not hide. Danielle had a frowning, almost tearful look on her humiliated little face. Mom patted her on her head.
"Now come on, baby. It's time for breakfast and I think they might still be serving breakfast at McDon's at this hour. Let's go!" Mom said, excited to get herself a McMuffin.
"Mom, I can't go out like this..." Danielle said.
She feared what it would be like if other kids saw her diapered up and treated like a baby.
"Well, you don't make the decisions, kiddo. You're on punishment." Mom said.
She pulled Danielle up to he feet and started walking toward the door, expecting Dani to follow.

What does Dani do?
11133212.title: "Baby Cutie" shirt

choices: Older sister Stephy shows up to annoy little Dani
1113322.content:
Mom took Danielle by the hand and helped her to her feet.
"Come on, baby. It's bath time." Mom said.
Danielle waddled close behind as Mom took her to the bathroom.

Mom got the water running and removed Danielle's diaper. Quickly, she put the little girl in the tub and began cleaning her, especially her hair and her diaper area. It was actually a little nice to be bathed by Mom, even if it was a bit humiliating for her to be scrubbing soap on her butt and her... private area. Quickly, Mom rinsed Dani off and took her out to dry her. Shed laid Danielle down on the floor to diaper her when the little girl began to feel a rumbling in her tummy.
"Oh... Oh, Mom, I don't feel so good...." Danielle said, rubbing her tummy.
Mom smiled.
"Oh, do you have to poop already?" Mom said.
Danielle didn't answer. Instead she let out a discomforted moan.
"Oh... Oooooh..." She said.
"Well, you probably have a lot in there. I don't see how it would hurt to let you poop a little." Mom said.
Danielle expected Mom to set her on the toilet, but instead she placed a bunch of toilet paper underneath the naked child's butt. She pressed down on Danielle's tummy and a little bit of poop came out. Danielle felt a little better but she knew there was still a lot in her.

Mom threw the waste in the toilet and resumed diapering Danielle. She applied plenty of baby oil and powder before getting out a very large and thick diaper, one with cute little pink stars on the waist. It was so large and thick it reached up over Danielle's bellybutton, and Danielle could hardly move her legs. She would be unable to walk without some assistance.

Mom helped her diapered daughter to her feet.
"Oh, aren't you adorable in your big fluffy diaper?" Mom said.
Danielle hung her head in shame.
"Mom, I can barely walk." Danielle whined.
Mom only giggled. She was enjoying punishing her daughter a little too much.
"Come on, baby Dani. Let's go watch TV together! The baby shows are on!" Mom said.

Mom took Danielle, still dressed in only the thick diaper, out to the living room. she turned on the TV and Sesame Street was on. Danielle used to love this show when she was a real baby, but watching it now felt degrading.

What happens next?
1113322.title: Mom gives Danielle a bath

choices: Tickle Danielle until she poops herself
Carry Danielle up to her room and whack her with a fly swatter
11133221.content:
Danielle began to feel very weak and tired. The muscle relaxants were really doing a number on her. She could barely sit up. Mom took notice.
"Oh, is little Dani feeling tired?" Mom said.
She picked up Dani and set the little girl on her lap. Danielle wanted to curl up in a little ball and cry, but she was too weak and helpless to even do that. Mom looked in her face and stroked her little girl's hair. She loved how well this punishment was working.
"See what happens when you act like a brat, little Dani?" Mom whispered.
Danielle grimaced.

Just when Danielle thought things couldn't get any worse, her teenage sister Stephanie came downstairs from her room.
"Hey, Mom. How's it..." Stephanie immediately took notice of her diapered little sister and laughed.
"Ha ha! What? What is going on with Dani?" Stephanie said, rushing over.
Danielle moaned in discomfort. Mom turned to her older daughter and smiled.
"Well, little baby Dani threw a temper tantrum last night, so I put her on diaper punishment. She wears diapers now and she gets fed muscle relaxants and laxatives, so she's kept weak and unable to control her little poops! Isn't that right, baby Dani?" Mom said, pinching Danielle's cheeks.
Danielle moaned again. She also urinated a little bit in her diaper but no one took notice.

Stephy was laughing like crazy now.
"Wow, that's awesome, Mom. And she looks so cute too!" Stephy said.
She really did think Danielle looked quite cute in her diaper. Normally Danielle was obnoxious and bratty toward her older sister. Stephy was quite amused to see her humiliated like this.
Stephy kneeled down to eye level.
"So, are you really weak like Mom said?" Stephy said.
She look a lock of Danielle's hair and pulled it.
"Hey! Quit it!" Danielle said.
She tried to move her arm to push Stephy away, but she was too weak to lift it above her neck. Normally, this would've been enough for her to start fighting Stephy, but the muscle relaxants kept her down. Stephy laughed some more.
"Aw, that's so cute. She really is like a weak little baby!" Stephy said.
Mom nodded.
"Yep. You want to take care of her a little while so I can get some housework done?" Mom said.
"Sure!" Stephy said, eager for an opportunity to humiliate and annoy her little sister.

Stephy sat down on the couch and Mom pushed the weakened and humiliated Danielle onto the older sister's lap. An evil smile crossed Stephy's face as Mom got up to do some housework. Helpless little Danielle quivered with fear, knowing Stephy had a very cruel sense of humor.
"Oh, we're going to have some fun, little baby..." Stephy said.

What does Stephy plan to do to Danielle?
11133221.title: Older sister Stephy shows up to annoy little Dani

choices: Stephy takes her to the bathroom and changes her diaper
Stephy takes stinky Danielle over to Mom
111332212.content:
Just as Danielle began to feel relaxed nestled in her older sister's arms. Stephy began shifting her around to lift her up.
"Come on, baby Dani, let's play a game!" Stephy said.
"Wha.. what?" Danielle mumbled.
Stephy carried the diapered little girl up to her room. Danielle only moaned, sure this would only lead to more pain and humiliation.

Stephy set Danielle down on her bed. Danielle normally was not allowed in her older sister's room, so it seemed rather odd to her. Stephy's room was a bit messy and cluttered, her closet overflowing with junk and her books and papers all over the floor. The weakened diapered Danielle was growing frightened.
"Wha... what are you going to do to me?" Danielle asked.
An evil smile crossed Stephy's face, and she let out a giggle.
"We're going to play a game, Dani." Stephy said, digging through her closet.
She soon found what she was looking for and triumphantly stood up holding a fly swatter. Danielle quivered.
"We're going to play Trivia Quiz! I'm going to ask you some fun little trivia questions, and if you get it wrong, you get a swat!" Stephy said with a sadistic grin.
Danielle really didn't like where this was going. She tried to crawl away, but Stephy blocked the little girl with her arms, and flipped her over on her back. Stephy took out a piece of paper full of homework questions from last year.

"All right, Danielle, what element has the highest melting point?" Stephy asked.
"I... I don't know.... Fire?" Danielle said.
Stephy laughed.
"Fire isn't an element, you little dummy! The correct answer is Tungsten!" The older girl laughed.
Danielle was just a dumb kid, and she knew these questions would be far too hard for an eight-year old. She groaned. Stephy took the fly swatter and whacked Dani on the chest several time.
"Ouch!" Danielle said.
"Okay now, Dani, next question: what did Beowulf fight in his last battle?" Stephy asked.
"I don't know, I didn't watch that movie!" Danielle said.
"It's not a movie, stupid! It's an epic poem I had to read last year. Also, it was a dragon!" Stephy said.
She whacked Danielle with the flyswatter all over the little girl's bare legs and tummy.
"If you're going to hit me, why not just do it instead of asking me hard questions?" Danielle cried.
"Because this is more fun and I get to make you feel stupid." Stephy said.
"I don't like this game..." Dani said.
Stephy laughed some more.
"Well, tough luck, diaper kid. I'm in charge right now since mom's busy and I say we keep playing. Next question: What year did Hitler die?" Stephy said.
Danielle wasn't sure about it, but she was vaguely aware that Hitler was from World War 2, and that was sometime in the 1940's. She let out a guess.
"Ah... um.... 1945?" Danielle said.
Stephy was pleasantly surprised.
"Wow... you actually got that one right! great job!" Stephy said.
Stephy patted her little sister on the head. Danielle smiled, feeling a little bit smart for once (normally everyone knew she wasn't the brightest)

"Okay, next question: How many...." Before Stephy could finish, Danielle lost control of herself. With her body addled by all the laxatives and muscle relaxants, Danielle couldn't control her poops at all. She let out a soft fart and a little bit of poop went into her diaper. Danielle closed her eyes with shame.
"Aw, gross!" Stephy said.
She whacked Danielle on her arms and chest a couple times with the fly swatter, leaving little red mark now.
"Ow! Ow! Stop it!" Danielle begged, on the verge of tears again. Stephy seemed almost joyful at having an excuse to whack her helpless sister even more
"Stinky little loser!" Stephy laughed.
It wasn't a laughing matter to Danielle, though.
Stephy lifted up Danielle by her arms and hoisted the little girl up. Danielle would've squirmed but she was too weak. She felt extra-pathetic now.
"Come on, stinky-butt. You need a change." Stephy said.
111332212.title: Fly Swatter

11133222.content:
Mom held little Danielle on her lap while Elmo from Sesame Street laughed and went on about numbers. Danielle wasn't too happy about being babied like this, but sitting nearly naked on her mother's lap in after being bathed and forced to poop had a way of instilling a bit of humility in her. In fact, Danielle kept trying to hide her face, as if there was some invisible audience laughing at her. Mom only stifled laughter.
"She sure is a lot cuter when she isn't talking back." Mom thought in her head.
She stroked little Danielle's hair. The little girl quivered uncomfortably.

"Oh, I know what you need! My little baby must be getting hungry." Mom said.
She reached in a conveniently placed diaper bag she had prepared the previous night, and took out a warm bottle of baby formula. She held it next to Danielle's mouth.
"Go on, baby Dani, eat up."
The little girl had the feeling she would be punished further if she didn't drink any of the formula. Obediently, she suckled. Mom rubbed her little tummy as she drank.
"Good girl..." Mom said.
This bottle was, of course, filled with more muscle relaxants and laxatives. Danielle could practically feel her body growing weaker as she drank it. By the time she had almost finished the bottle, Danielle could barely hold her arms up. Mom had to hold the bottle for her and feed her.
"All done!" Mom cheerfully said as Danielle drank the last few drops.

Almost as soon as Dani finished her bottle, she felt a rumbling in her body. She moaned.
"Oh... Oh no... Mom.... I think I have to poop..." Danielle said.
Mom smiled and booped Dani on the nose.
"Well, that's what your diaper's for, silly." Mom said.
Danielle moaned again. With all the strength her drug-weakened little body could muster, she threw herself from her mother's lap and tried to crawl toward the bathroom. Mom laughed as her daughter pathetically slipped and tumbled, barely even able to get on her hands and knees.
"You won't get far, Dani. Toilets are for big girls. Use your diaper like the baby you are." Mom said.
Danielle was nearly in tears now. She only made it to the edge of the living room near the hallway when she could hold it no more. Tearfully, Danielle curled in a balled and sobbed. An uncomfortable expression crossed her little face as she soiled herself. Mom walked over to her humiliated sobbing daughter.

"Aw, did baby make a doodie?" Mom said.
"I hate you..." Danielle hopelessly whispered through her tears.
Mom laughed.
"That's no way to talk to your mommy." She said.
Mom lifted Danielle up, her arms hooked around the little girl's legs and head, and carried her just like a baby to the bathroom to change her. Danielle felt so helpless, with her body as weak as a kitten sitting in her own waste. Mom set her down on the changing mat.
"There, there, little baby. Mommy's here to get you cleaned up again." Mom said.
She untaped Danielle's diaper.
"Oh, that's a yucky doodie." Mom said.
"Stop it..." Danielle begged.
Mom ignored her and proceeded to get out a wet wipe to wipe Danielle's stinky butt.
11133222.title: Danielle poops herself again

choices: Boy who is treated like a girl
112.content:
Are you a boy or a girl?

11231.content:
Our story starts with You, our main character, Danielle. You are a cute little eight-year-old girl. You live with your Mom, Dad and your big sister Stephanie. Stephanie is fifteen years old and often went by "Steph" or "Stephy". She is much bigger than you, and can be quite mean. Your parents are going on a second honeymoon, and Stephanie was left in charge of you. They would be gone for several days.

Things were going great for a couple hours until it was getting close to your bedtime.
"Danielle! Come on, it's time for you to take a bath and go to bed." Stephanie said, barging into your room.
You pouted. You didn't really like taking baths and you didn't want to go to bed, you wanted to stay up and play.
"Aw, do I have to?" You whined.
Steph's eyes narrowed.
"Look, Dani, are you going to come quietly or are you going to be a little butt slug?" Stephy said.
You hated it when she called you a butt slug. You weren't even particularly slug-like, being a frail and skinny kid, but it still hurt to be called that.
"You're so mean!" You said.
Stephy grabbed you around your waist and lifted you up to take you to the bathroom.
"EEEEEEEH! Let go!" You screeched, kicking and hitting her.
Stephy only scowled as your weak, feeble little-girl punches and kicks bounced off of her tough teenage body.

Stephy forcefully removed your clothes and put you in the bathtub. The water was too cold.
"Stephy, you're being a jerk! I don't wanna take a bath!" You whined.
"Cram it, slug-girl. Don't make me get out the salt!" Stephy said.
She sometimes threw salt at you to take the slug insult further.

You tried to stand up and get out of the tub, but Stephy pushed you down. You were under a lot of stress now and your frail little-girl body could take no more. Something had to give. Quick as a flash, before you even knew it, you bowels loosened and you pooped in the tub. Stephy look in disbelief.
"OH. MY. GOD! You did not just do that!" Stephy said.
"I... It was an accident!" You said, on the verge of tears.
Surprisingly, instead of whacking you on the head or yelling at you, Stephy got out her phone and snapped a picture of you, sitting naked in the tub next to your own waste. Your blood ran cold.
"What... what did you just do?" You said.
"I took a picture. Now I'll post it online so everyone can see what a little poopy butt slug you are!" Stephy said.
The thought of your classmates, or worse, your friends, logging on and seeing you like this made you want to vomit.
"P... please, Stephy! Don't do it! I'll do anything!" You begged.
Stephy scoffed.
"Well, first you get out of that toilet water you call a bath so I can clean it up. Don't get dressed, just dry off and stay naked in your room. I have some clothes for you." Stephy said.
You grew very nervous as you wondered what Stephy would make you wear. You got out of the tub, grabbed a towel, and wrapped it around your little body. You waited in your room just as your big sister had asked.

Stephy came in later holding a package in her hand. On closer inspection, you realized it was diapers.
"Diapers?" You said.
"Yeah. I you're going to poop like a baby I'll make you dress like one. Until Mom and Dad come home, you're my little diaper slave, got it? You only wear diapers around the house and have to do whatever I say.... and you have to poop and pee in the diapers!" Stephy said with a cackle.
She was determined to humiliate, torment, and dominate you as much as she could with an opportunity like this.
"No fair!" You whined.
"You want me to post the pics online?" Stephy threatened.
You frowned and laid down so Stephy could diaper you. you closed your eyes, not even bearing to look as she taped the white plastic garment over your private areas. You now laid on your bed wearing nothing ore than a diaper. Again, Stephy snapped a picture with her phone.
"Hey!" You said.
"You don't behave like a good little diaper slave and I won't post that one either." Stephy said.
It seemed you had no choice but to obey Stephy's every command.

You shed a tear and your face twisted into a crooked smile. You felt like your sister was a tremendous jerk, but you also felt like she was still your big sister. You remembered all the times you were annoying to her, remembered all the times you acted like a brat for a few second. You thought maybe this was retribution for that? That she might be humiliating you because you annoyed her?

You stayed in your room and watched TV for a little while. You grew hungry as you waited since you hadn't had any breakfast and it was already getting close to lunch time. Your tummy rumbled. Then, you heard the door open downstairs.

11312.title: Diapered and transferred to the pre-school class

113123.content:
Henry is always picking on you.

"You're such a baby" he taunts, cornering you at playtime. "I bet you still wet the bed."

"I do not!" you deny, crossing your arms and flashing him a defiant stare.

He laughs, pushing you back. You stumble, uncrossing your arms, but manage to steady yourself - avoiding falling in the mud.

"Do too! You're so weak. Your mum probably still wipes your bottom for you when you sit on the potty!"

You growled, wanting desperately to hit him back, or say something or even run away. But he was bigger than you, you couldn't think of anything - and there was nowhere to run.

"And I bet you suck your thumb, and sleep in a crib, and..."

"Stop lying!" you scream, but he only keeps laughing. Mercifully, you hear the whistle blow to call you back inside to the classroom. You line up behind Henry, waiting to file back inside.

"You're too much of a baby to come in here" laughs Henry, pushing you back again "Go back to the preschool."

"I DO NOT go to the preschool!" you hiss, only to be interrupted by a loud shush from Miss Harris.

"Daniel! No talking!"

Miss Harris was mean. Well, she wasn't mean to the other students - but she hated you. She was always telling you off even when you hadn't done anything wrong, and she even kept you back at playtime sometimes to punish you when she was really angry. Henry, on the other hand, was her favorite student. She never told him off, and she always praised him in front of the other kids for even the smallest little things. He never got in trouble, and he was mean all the time. It wasn't fair.

Henry smirks at you again, mocking you for getting told off.

"Naughty baby!" he scolds in a loud enough voice. Miss Harris, of course, doesn't seem to hear him.

You start thinking about how unfair it is. Maybe Miss Harris wouldn't be so nice to Henry if she knew how mean he was? You think about telling on Henry.

Should you tell on Henry to Miss Harris?
113123.title: No reason - your teacher doesn't like you

1131231.content:
The other kids are sitting down in their seats when you go up to Miss Harris.

"Miss Harris..."

"What is it Daniel, we're about to start."

"It's just that..."

"Come on, hurry up!"

You blush red at being told off already. Maybe this wasn't such a good idea.

"At playtime, Henry called me a baby and..."

"Are you telling tales, Daniel?" inquired Miss Harris aggressively, knitting her brow in an angry glare.

You're confused. Weren't you supposed to tell if someone was pikcing on you?

"No..."

"Don't lie, Daniel. You're telling tales. Its very rude and immature to tell tales."

You pout, retreating slightly as you're left not knowing what to say.

"I'm not lying, it's true. He called me a-"

Miss Harris interrupts you, calling out across the classroom.

"Henry! Come over here please."

He does so, striding confidently over to the teacher's desk.

"Yes, Miss Harris?" he asks politely.

"Did you call Daniel names at playtime?" she asks in a monotone, as if bored or going through the motions.

Henry gives you a small private smirk

"No, Miss Harris."

She turns back to you, the same angry stare plastered onto her face.

"It's very babyish of you to make up lies about other students, Daniel. I shall be speaking to you at lunchtime."

"But its not a lie! He-"

"Daniel" Miss Harris interrupts chidingly.

You keep going

"He called me really mean names, he does it all the time and-

"Daniel!"

"...he's lying now and-"

"DANIEL!" yells Miss Harris, shocking you into silence. She is almost shaking with rage as you stand cowed before her.

"This behavior is not acceptable! I'm taking you to see the headmaster at once. Henry, keep control of the class."

"Yes, Miss Harris" smirks Henry.
1131231.title: Tell on him

11312311.content:
"I simply cannot have this immature little boy in my class any longer!" lectures Miss Harris, pointing accusingly at you as you sit with your head down on a small plastic chair in the corner, swinging your legs back and forth.

The headmaster, Mr McMaron is a small beadle of a man, with small rodent features and a slow ponderous way of doing things. In front of the furious Miss Harris, however, he is quite helpless, letting out his reply in a soft uncertain voice.

"I understand Miss Harris, but there is only one Year 3 class in this school. I don't know what you would like me to do"

"Well move him to a different class of course!"

The headmaster starts searching through his desks as if looking for a record of some kind.

"Well" he echoes, sorting desperately through his papers "if his academic achievement is sufficient, I could consider moving him up to Mrs Hartman's class..."

Miss Harris interrupted.

"No, no, no. I assure you he is not at all prepared for that. I think he would be more suited for Miss Green's class."

The headmaster raises a bushy eyebrow curiously

"Miss Green? But that is the preschool class..."

"I'm quite aware Mr McMaron, but given the state of his emotional development and his uniquely sub-par academic performance I think it is quite appropriate."

The headmaster shrugs.

"Well, you know best Miss Harris. Of course, I would need Miss Green's agreement and some parental consent, but otherwise I can see no reason why I should not allow it in principal..."

"Thank you, Mr McMaron. There was one other thing..."

The headmaster gives a tired look, clearly wishing to be done with the whole situation.

"Yes? What was that?"

"I had in mind certain special arrangements for Daniel here once he has been transferred to his new class. I'm sure Miss Green will agree that they are necessary..."

Mr McMaron puts up his hands

"Any special educational arrangements are up to you. If you and Miss Green think they are best for him feel free to go ahead."

"Thank you, Mr McMaron" smirks Miss Harris, triumphant.
11312311.title: You are punished

113123111.content:
The next day, you are dropped off at the door for the preschool, rather than the Year 3 classroom.

Your mother had been quick to give her consent once Miss Harris had given her a full account of your "behavior". She had been shocked to hear about your constant lying, tale-telling and simple incompatibility with children of your own age. She had been consoled, of course, that the change would be only temporary - going on only for as long as it were necessary. It was, however, strictly necessary to aid your emotional and academic development. You were not progressing at all in the Year 3 classroom, she was told. If it were not done, said Miss Harris, you would be socially crippled for life - and how could your mother say no to that?

So she had agreed, and you were shipped off back to the preschool class. No degree of crying, yelling or insisting that Miss Harris was lying could convince her otherwise. In fact, they only further convinced her that the change was needed.

Miss Green greeted you at the door. She was a bubbly kind of woman, always enthusiastic about something. Today, that something was you.

"Hi Daniel! Are you excited to be starting school?"

You gave a curt nod.

What was she talking about starting school? You guessed she was trying to make you feel like you were just like the other students.

"Great!" she took you by the hand like you were a little kid, leading you inside while the other preschool kids got ready for the start of the day. She showed you the basics of the classroom - the coat-hooks, the toys and the tables with the little chairs around them. You vaguely remembered them from when you were in preschool, which was oddly comforting - but it also made you feel totally humiliated. Finally, she led you into a back room where a blue and white striped baby changing table was set out on top of a table. Next to it sat a large package of huggies diapers.

"Jump up on the table Daniel, there's a good boy."

You froze up. Why was she putting you in a diaper? It didn't make any sense.

"I don't need a diaper. I'm not a baby."

Miss Green smiled

"Don't be silly, Daniel. Now get up on the table. I don't want to be firm with you."

What do you do?

11431.content:
Those words her parents told her rang out in Danielle's mind.
"Now, be good for Aunt Tanya. Do everything she says. If you're a good girl, I'll be back for your ninth birthday!" Her father had told her.
That was before he went off to fight in the War, to risk his life and kill other men for his nation. It wasn't something Danielle understood very well, but she worried about him every day. She worried that he might not come back in time for her birthday... if he ever came back at all.

Now Danielle was in Aunt Tanya's house. She was from a poor family, so she didn't have much in her bags, just some clothes and a couple toys. It was late out and the little girl was getting tired. Aunt Tanya had two kids, both of them older than Danielle. She had a boy, Greg, who was in high school, and a girl, Renee, who had just turned 13. None of them ever really like Danielle much, and didn't really like her father the soldier either, but they felt an obligation to take care of Danielle while he was out on the battlefield.
"All right, Dani, you can sleep on the couch when Greg's done with it. We'll figure out where your room will be in the morning." Aunt Tanya said.
Greg was in fact on the couch watching TV. Danielle looked up at her Aunt with wide, trusting eyes.
"Thanks, Auntie Tanya!" She said, giving the woman a hug around her legs.
Aunt Tanya grunted. Even when Danielle was being cute she could barely stand her.
"Right, whatever. I'm going to smoke and then going to bed. Don't touch any of my knives, cigarettes, or beer." Aunt Tanya said.
She took a pack of cigs form her purse and went to her room. She opened a window so it wouldn't get too smoky, but closed the door so Danielle wouldn't see it. Aunt Tanya was a dirty and somewhat unhinged woman, but she had a sense of honor not to smoke or drink when children are watching.

Danielle sat down next to Greg on the couch.
"Watcha doin?" Danielle asked.
"TV." Greg said.
"Cool, what show?" Danielle asked.
"Commercials." Greg said.
It was in fact an infomercial for an industrial strength cleaning agent.
"Oh. That's boring." Danielle said.
"Yeah, I don't care. I'll watch stuff just 'cuz it's on." Greg said.
Danielle sat next to Greg and watched the commercials for a moment and quickly grew bored.
"Where's Renee?" Danielle asked.
"Jeez, you ask way too many questions. Sis is in her room. It's past her bedtime, just like it is for you." Greg said.
"Auntie said I have to sleep on the couch but I can't until you're done." Danielle said, smiling.
It felt special for her to be staying up this late.
"No duh." Greg said, growing increasingly annoyed with his little cousin.
Danielle sensed the tension and quieted down so Greg could watch a bearded man on TV tell him how clean his floor tiles could be.

Soon, the loud sound of snoring could be heard coming from Aunt Tanya's room.
"Aw, nice. Mom's asleep." Greg said.
He got up and went to the fridge.
"Oh, whatcha getting? Midnight snack?" Danielle asked.
"No, I'm getting a beer." Greg said.
Danielle gasped.
"Ooooooh, you're too young for that!" She said.
Greg shrugged his shoulders.
"So? I steal my mom's beer all the time. She never keeps track unless there's only one or two cans left in the fridge." Greg said.
He sat down next to little Danielle, cracked open the can, and took a long sip. Danielle looked on anxiously.
"Is it good?" She asked.
"Not really." Greg said.
It was in fact a cheap poorly made beer. Greg took another sip. Then, in a rare moment of generosity, he thought about sharing it with Danielle.
"You wanna try?" He asked.
Danielle quivered.
"I don't know..." She said, looking at her legs.
"Go no, try a little." Greg said, handing her the can.
Danielle took a nice long sip of the beer. It tasted awful and burned slightly.
"Ew, how can grown-ups drink this stuff?" Danielle said.
Greg laughed and took the beer back.
"What the hell ,you drank, like, half the can?" Greg said.
"I was thirsty..." Danielle said, apologetically.
"Ah, it gets better the more you drink it." He said.
Daniellle began to feel rather sick. The beer didn't agree with her. She watched more infomercials until she could take no more.
"Oh... Greg, can I lay down on the couch? I don't feel so good." Danielle said.
"Fine, whatever." Greg said.
Danielle stretched out and put her head on Greg's lap. Greg didn't like having Danielle's head weighing down on his legs so close to his crotch. It made him feel really uncomfortable... That is, until Danielle farted.
*Phuuuut*
"Ew, what the hell, Dani?" Greg said.
Danielle moaned.
"Oh, I shouldn't have drank all that beer." Danielle said.
Her tummy felt like it was swimming in slime and twisting itself in knots.
"Well, no duh, beer's not for kids for a reason." Greg said.
Danielle rubbed her aching tummy. Then, she began to wet herself.
"Oh! Oh my god, what's happening to me?" Danielle said.
"Are you wetting yourself?" Greg yelped, bolting to his feet.
Danielle cried a little.
"I wet the bed sometimes..." She said, tears in her eyes.
"Screw this, I'm getting Mom." Greg said.
Danielle let out a low wail.
"Oh, I feel so sick!" She moaned.

Greg went to his mother's room. She asleep in her bed, snoring loudly.
"Hey, Mom." Greg said.
"What the hell do you want?" Aunt Tanya said groggily.
"Danielle drank some of your beer and now she's sick. Also she wet herself." Greg said.
At this, Aunt Tanya bolted up to her feet.
"SHE WHAT? Aunt Tanya roared.
Tanya ran over to the living room, where Danielle was on the couch peeing and farting uncontrollably. She also had pooped herself a little.
"Aunt Tanya! Help me!" The sick little girl called out.
"Hey! told you not touch my beer!" Aunt Tanya roared.
"It.. it wasn't my idea! Greg gave it to me!" Danielle cried.
"Aw you little snitch!" Greg shouted.
Tanya smacked Greg in the face too.
"Don't be stealing my beer! You can buy your own when you're old enough and have a job!" Tanya said.
Greg backed off to let his mother do her thing.

Aunt Tanya picked up little Danielle by the collar of her shirt and slapped the little girl across the face. Danielle urinated more into her already soaked shorts.
"Wow, gross. You disgusting child, you need a diaper." Aunt Tanya said.
She sent Greg out to buy some diapers while she began to remove Danielle's soiled clothes. Soon Danielle was left naked and sobbing, reeking of pee.
"I'm sorry! I'm so sorry!" Danielle said.
"You better be. Now bend over. You're getting a spanking." Aunt Tanya said.
She bent Danielle over her knee, picked up a ruler, and relentlessly smacked Danielle's bottom. Danielle screamed and cried, but Aunt Tanya didn't stop. Once Danielle's butt was red and sore, she whacked the rest of Danielle's body, her legs, her arms, her back ,her chest, even her genitals. Danielle was left sobbing and hoarse, her whole body red and covered in little bruises.
"I'm sorry, Auntie... I'm so sorry..." Danielle cried.

Soon, Greg returned with the diapers. Aunt Tanya taped one up on Danielle and glared at her.
"Now, you're wearing diapers until I decide you're good enough, understand?" She said.
She put her hand under Dani's chin and forced the diapered kid to look her in the face. Tears still streamed down Danielle's face.
"You are a bad, disgusting, terrible little girl. Never do any of this again, understand?" Aunt Tanya said.
Danielle sobbed and nodded.
"I... I'm sorry." She said.
"Okay. And we'll work on that bedwetting problem too. But as long as you're a bad girl you wear diapers. Now, let's get you to bed." Aunt Tanya said.

The couch was soaked with Danielle's urine, so it wasn't an option. Greg was busy cleaning it. Where is Dani sent to sleep?
11431.title: Diapered by Aunt Tanya

choices: Let her have some real food
Threaten to put her back in the suitcase
114311.content:
Aunt Tanya got out a large suitcase with wheels on the bottom. It was plenty big enough for a small girl like Danielle.
"Here. Get in." Aunt Tanya said.
"What?" The diapered girl said, confused.
"This is your room now. Get in. Go to your room." Aunt Tanya said.
Danielle let out a few more tears, knowing full well how bad this was going to be. Slowly, she climbed into the suitcase and curled up in a little ball. It was surprisingly roomy in there, and she could even move her arms and legs a little.
"Good. Now stay in your room until morning. I'll have no more shenanigans tonight." Aunt Tanya said.
She quickly latched the lid on the suitcase, leaving poor little Danielle alone in the dark. Danielle was really scared. Her mind raced.
"Oh, this is so bad. What if they never let me out? I want my daddy! I want him to be back from that stupid war and give me a hug!" Danielle thought.
She stayed there for hours until she eventually sobbed herself to sleep.

_____________________________________________

Danielle woke up some time later, still in pitch darkness inside the suitcase. She instinctively went to sit up, but bumped her head.
"Ow..." The diapered little girl groaned.
Worse still, she felt a bad need to poop and pee, as she often did in the morning. She began to shake around and yell for help.
"Somebody help me! I have too pee! Let me out! Please! I'll be good!" Danielle called out.
She desperately knocked on the inside of the box, but no one came. She didn't know it, but it was daytime outside and Aunt Tanya had taken Greg and Renee to the store and left Danielle home alone. No matter how much she banged and screamed, no one would hear Danielle until she got back.
"Help! Help! Please?" Danielle called out.
She banged around for half an hour before she could take no more. Danielle's bladder was particularly weak, and she soon urinated all over the inside of her diaper. Realizing it was futile, she also allowed herself to poop in her diaper too. The smell began to build up inside the suitcase. The little girl coughed and cried. Again her thoughts went to Daddy. She squirmed anxiously.
"It's going to be okay. This is okay. This won't last forever. If I'm a good girl Daddy will be back from the war in time for my birthday. Then this will all be a bad memory. That's it! A memory! Yeah! And then I'll never be diapered and locked in a suitcase again!" Danielle said.
Despite what she told herself, she still sobbed. This was probably the worst day of her life already, and something told her it wasn't going to get much better.

Danielle waited a while longer and her tummy began to rumble.
"Oh... I'm so hungry..." Danielle moaned.
She wondered how long she was in the suitcase. She wondered if she would starve in there. Again, fear and despair began to overtake her, until she heard a sound outside, the sound of an opening door. Aunt Tanya and her cousins were home. Danielle's ears perked up.
"Oh, Renee, can you go check on Dani? She's in the big suitcase in the hall." Aunt Tanya said.
Danielle heard soft footsteps moving toward her, and then the sound of the suitcase unlatching. Rays of light poured into the suitcase and Renee's face appeared before little Danielle.
"Oof, you stink!" Renee said.
Danielle sat up and hung her head in shame.
"I... I had to go poo-poo." She said.
Danielle then tried to climb out of the suitcase, but her legs went wobbly and she fell on her face outside of it.
"Th... Thanks for letting me out." Danielle said, smiling.
It was a great feeling of freedom being out of the suitcase. Renee didn't seem to care, though.
"Mom! Danielle needs a diaper change!" Renee called out.
"So clean her up!" Aunt Tanya called back.
Renee let out a disgusted grunt and helped Danielle to her feet. Going by the amount of light coming from the windows, Danielle guessed it was around noon. She'd been locked in the suitcase all morning.
"Come on, stupid. Mom says I have to change you." Renee said.
Danielle didn't like being called stupid, but she really appreciated being freed. She awkwardly stumbled to give Renee a hug.
"Thank you! thank you! thank you!" Danielle said.
"Ew! Don't touch me! You smell like poop!" Renee spat.

Renee took Danielle to the bathroom.
"Lay down and take off that diaper. Let's make this quick." Renee said.
Danielle did as she was told as her teenage cousin got out a fresh diaper. Renee carefully threw out Danielle's old diaper, wiped her down with a washrag and taped up a new one.
"Thanks, Renee." Danielle said, smiling.
Renee didn't share Danielle's gratitude.
"Just, never tell anyone about this, okay? Like, ever." Renee said.
She glared at her diapered cousin with disgust.
"Sure thing! Hey, I'm really hungry. Can I have something to eat?" Danielle asked, slowly getting to her feet.
Her legs still felt rather weak and wobbly.
"Ugh, fine." Renee said.
She led Danielle to the kitchen and poured her a bowl of dog food. They didn't even own a dog, Aunt Tanya had bought it so they could feed it to Danielle.
"There you go. Eat up." Renee said.
Danielle awkwardly laughed like it was some kind of joke.
"That's... I can't eat that." Danielle said.
"Well, that's what Mom bought for you. She said that if you're on punishment you eat dog food." Renee said.
The teenage girl giggled a little. This was somewhat funny to her, forcing a little girl in a diaper to eat dog food.
"Danielle looked Renee in the face and tried her gest to look as cute and nice as she could.
"Can I have some real food please? Maybe some cereal or a piece of toast? I don't need much. Please?" Danielle begged.

What does cousin Renee do?
114311.title: Aunt Tanya makes Danielle sleep in a suitcase

choices: A huge babybottle (for calfs) of milk
1143112.content:
Renee looks at the bowl of dog food.
The pile of dry little pieces is maybe not delicious, but not as disgusting as the dog food from cans.
“Listen Baby, you pissed on the sofa and because you need diapers, you already cost a lot of money. You will eat this or I send you back in the suitcase until you are really hungry.”

Danielle is close to tears and slowly nods her head.
Even slower she bends down and starts to eat the dog food, using her mouth, like a real dog.

This makes Renee giggle.
“Aww, such a good little puppy. A smart girl would use her hand, but you are only a stupid little baby cub.”

Danielle blush a bit and starts to use her hand, but Renee slaps it away.
“No no, you can continue as you started. Maybe we make it a rule that dog food has to be eaten like a dog.”

Danielle continues to eat until her biggest hunger is satisfied. To her surprise it is not that bad, only stale.
She sits up and looks at Renee, wiping some crumbs from her mouth.
“May I have something to drink? It was very dry.”

Renee nods her head.
“Sure baby, I have something special for you.”

She gives Danielle…
1143112.title: Threaten to put her back in the suitcase

choices: You decide to share a room with Chloe
You decide to share a room with Faye
11433.content:
You had mixed feelings, when thinking ahead of the following week.

While your parents booth had to go on a business trip you will have to stay at your Aunt Tanya and her daughters Chloe and Faye.

You know your aunt can be a very nice and caring person, on the other hand you also know she can be strict and has some weird habbits and she makes rules evryone in her houshold has to follow - no compromisses.

From your last visit you still can remember that even Faye, who is allready 15 years old still had a bedtime at 9 pm and had to be at home by 6 pm. Thats about the same times you have at home..but your just 8, here your times will be much earlier.

Then there was Chloe, She was 5 years old and still had to wear pullups all the time even she make it to the toilet most times.

These are just a few examples of the odd things who seems to be normal in your Aunts house.

When you parents brought you there, they stayed for a nice lunch your aunt made, but then it was time to say goodbye to your Mom and Dad.


Then aunt Tanya asked you in which room you wanted to sleep during your stay
11433.title: Forced to repeat potty training

choices: Boy who is treated like a girl
115.content:
Are you a boy or a girl?
If you are a boy, does your punishment include being treated like a girl?
115.title: A babysitter

choices: Diapered and taken on an outing
1151.content:
You are an 8-year-old boy named Daniel. Joanne, your babysitter will punish you by putting you back into diapers.

The story will begin on the next page after one last choice.

How severely are you punished?
1151.title: Boy

11512.content:
"But Mom!" you complain. "I'm 8 years old now. I don't need a babysitter."

"Daniel." Your mother says as she finishes packing. "Your father and I will be gone all weekend. We can't leave you alone for so long."

"But I can take care of myself." you whine.

"No." she says. "Kate will be staying here with you and you had better behave for her." She slams her suitcase closed as if to punctuate the statement.

You can see that there's no point arguing further so head to your room to sulk.

From your room you hear the doorbell ring and your mother greet Kate. Soon after that your mother and father let themselves into your room.

"We're leaving now." Your mother says.

"Be good for Kate." your father reminds you.

Then they are gone and you are left in the care of Kate. She lives down the street from you. She's 16 and has been babysitting you since you were 4. She's not that bad and usually lets you get away with more than your parent but just the idea that you need a babysitter hurts your developing ego.

"Hi Daniel." Kate knocks on your door a few minutes later.

"Go away." you reply. "I don't need a babysitter. I'm not a baby"

She lets herself in anyway. "Come on Daniel. I thought we were friends."

"Fuck off." you tell her, annoyed that she ignored your request that she go away.

She looks hurt but just closes the door and leaves.
11512.title: Treated like a baby

choices: Beg her not to do this to you
115122.content:
You hope that Kate has gotten the message and will leave you alone.

She does for a little under an hour. "Daniel." she lets herself back into your room.

"I thought I told you to fuck off." you say, emboldened by the reaction you got last time. "You stupid bitch."

"Not this time." she says pulling something out from behind her back. After a moment you realise it's a miniature voice recorder. She clicks a button and you hear yourself say. "Fuck off, you stupid bitch."

She let's that sink in for a moment. Your parents will kill you if they ever hear that recording. "Give that to me." you demand.

"Nope." she says. "I am going to punish you for talking to me like that. And if you don't accept your punishment I will give this to your parents." you make her point she plays it back one more time. "Fuck off, you stupid bitch."

"Okay." you give up. "If you promise to delete it."

"I promise." she says. "Now come on. We're need to pick up some things for your punishment."

"Where?" you ask.

"It's a surprise." she says as she leads you out of the house.

You follow in silence until you reach a small block of shops a couple of streets away. You wonder what Kate has in store for you when she leads you into the small supermarket. You begin to worry as she heads to the baby aisle.

"You'll need these." She selects the largest disposable diapers and hands you the package. "And these" she passes you some baby wipes. "And some pacifiers." she continues to select items from the shelf. "And bottles, and baby food."

Satisfied that she's got everything, she leads you up to the counter where she pays for the purchases

"What are you going to do with this stuff?" you ask as you leave the store, looking nervously at the shopping bad you are carrying.

"You said that you don't need a babysitter because you're not a baby." she explains. "So we're going to fix that. Your punishment is to be a baby for the rest of the weekend."
115122.title: Stay in your room

1151221.content:
"Please don't make me wear diapers." you beg. "I'll be good."

Kate thinks for a moment then decides "Okay."

"Thankyou." you say. "I promise I'll..."

"But..." she cuts you off. "If you aren't perfectly behaved then you're going to be a baby and I'll invite some friends to help take care of you."

"No!" you say. "Please don't do that."

"If it's too much of a risk you can just go straight into diapers when we get home." she offers.

"No." you decide. "I'll be good."

When you get back home, Kate puts the shopping away in the spare room, where she is sleeping this weekend, and you turn on your PS3 and sit on living room sofa with the controller.

About an hour later, as you are just about to start a boss-fight Kate comes in and says. "Dinner's ready."

You are too focused on the screen to respond.

"Come on." she says. "Before it gets cold."

"Hold on." you say as the beast punches your character through a wall.

Unwilling to wait, she walks over and turns off the console.

"What the fuck?" you ask, and immediately realise your mistake. "I didn't mean it."

"Too late." she says. "You can have baby-food for dinner. I'll invite one of my friends to eat with me."

"But..." you try to argue.

"No more chances." she says. "But I will let you decide who I'll invite to help babysit you. Tanya or Julia."

You know why she chose those two. Tanya's brother Kevin is one of your friends and Julia's sister Stephanie is also in your class.
1151221.title: Beg her not to do this to you

choices: Pull free from her hand and hide
11512212.content:
"Julia." you decide. There's no way you want Kevin to find out about this.

"Okay." she says and takes out her mobile phone. After a few minutes of chatting she hangs up and announces "Julia is on her way. Let's get you diapered before she arrives."

She takes you by the hand and leads you to the spare room where she removes your shoes, socks and jeans. "Lay on the bed." she directs you.

You do as you are told as she goes to the wardrobe and retrieves a diaper and the baby-powder. She unfolds the diaper as she brings it to the bed and lays it open next to you.

Next, with no concern for your modesty, she pulls your underpants down your legs and off over your feet. You quickly move your hands to cover yourself. "Lift your bottom." she directs as she slides the diaper underneath you.

You lower yourself reluctantly onto the thick padding as she sprinkles the powder over you. The smell makes you feel even more babyish than you already did. She quickly tapes you into the diaper and helps you up from the bed. Just in time to hear the doorbell ring.

"That'll be Julia." she says unnecessarily. "Come on." She begins to lead you by the hand to the front door.

"Wait." you say. "What about my pants." you look at your jeans laying on the floor.

"Don't worry about them." she says, pulling you out of the room. "It's okay for babies to wear just a t-shirt and diaper."
11512212.title: Choose Julia

choices: Dressed like a girl and diapered
Dressed like a girl, diapered and taken on an outing

The story will begin on the next page after one last choice.

1152.title: Boy who is treated like a girl

11521.content:
You'd finally done it. You'd made Joanne madder than ever before. She'd been you babysitter for the last four years and you knew what was coming. You lie on the bed, naked and rubbing your sore bum from the spanking you'd just received, awaiting the diaper you knew was coming. When she walked back into the bedroom, diaper and powder in hand, she wouldn't look you in the eyes. Her 20 year old breasts bounced freely in her pajama tank as she lifted your legs, powdered your sore bottom and diapered you snuggly. You started to set back up but she pushed you gently but firmly back on to your back and said,"you're not done yet" before walking to her closet and rummaging through.
"Hmmm...no.........no.....too big......Here we go!" Joanne pulled out a tee from the back of her closet, obviously a few years old as it looked a bit too tight for her, but it would be perfect for you. It was white with a daisy on the front and said flower child in bubbly letters. She pulled it over your head and it was baggy enough to come just past you waist but not enough to cover your diapers. She slipped your socks onto your feet and told you to go get your shoes while she got dressed.
11521.title: Dressed like a girl and diapered

choices: Diapered and taken on an outing
1153.content:
You are an 8-year-old girl named Danielle. Joanne, your babysitter will punish you by putting you back into diapers.

The story will begin on the next page after one last choice.

How severely are you punished?
1153.title: Girl

choices: Baby party (Joanne's friends come over to gawk and baby Danielle too)
11532.content:
Danielle was just a cute little girl. She had short black hair, and was rather small and weak, even for a kid her age. She also had a habit of misbehaving and talking back. One day, her parents left to go on vacation and hired Joanne, a teenage babysitter, to try and get Dani to straighten up. Joanne was very tall and strong, she was a senior in high school and on the girls basketball team. She had a toned, athletic body that stood slightly more than six feet tall, with long brown hair that went halfway down her back. Her height alone was enough to intimidate most kids to be good.
________________________________________________________________________

"We're leaving, Dani. Be good for your babysitter!" Mom said, right before she drove away.
Danielle was left alone in the living room with Joanne now. She had heard of Joanne from some of the other kids around the neighborhood, and knew she was scary and tough when she was mad. Dani was determined to try and resist. The towering babysitter loomed over Danielle, smiling warmly and scruffed up the little girl's hair.
"So, you're Dani? You're a real cutie." Joanne said.
Danielle pouted and pushed Joanne's hand away.
"Stop it!" She said.
"Okay, Okay. I was just teasing a little. Jeez." Joanne said.
Danielle made an angry look and puffed up her cheeks, as if this made her look intimidating in the slightest.
"You're not my Mommy so I'm not listening to anything you say! You're just a big dumb babysitter! You suck!" Danielle said.
Joanne laughed.
"Feisty kid, aren't you? Listen, little girl, I can be the nicest, sweetest babysitter you ever met love, hugs, kisses, all that fun stuff... or you can get love hugs, kisses, and a nasty, punishment you'll remember for the rest of your life. So, how about you apologize for that 'you suck' remark, kiddo, hm?" Joanne said.
Danielle stuck out her tongue and made raspberry noises. She then turned around and farted a stinky little girl fart at Joanne, something she often did to her parents when feeling rebellious.

At first Joanne only glared, not amused by Dani's antics... but then she giggled a bit.
"Well, I guess we get to do this the fun way." The babysitter said.
Joanne grabbed little Dani by the sleeve of her shirt and pulled her into the bathroom.
"Eek!" Dani screeched.
Joanne pulled down Danielle's pants and panties, and threw them aside. She also removed the little girl's shirt, leaving Dani totally naked.
"Hey! What are you doing?" Danielle yelped.
"You aren't giving me the respect a proper babysitter deserves, so you're getting punished." Joanne bluntly stated.
She bent the naked Danielle over her knee and began to spank her tender bottom with great force!
"You! Need! To! Learn! To! Respect! Your! Elders!" Joanne said, punctuating each word with a strong, whack.
Danielle let out a little "Eeek!" every time she was hit.
Joanne whacked Danielle a final time, and to her shock, the little girl peed a tiny bit on her lap.
"Ew! Gross!" Joanne said.
Danielle, thoroughly humiliated now, having lost control of her bladder, only whimpered and tried not to cry.

"So, you act like a little baby farting at me, and now you pee yourself like a little baby too. Danielle, I think this only means one thing..." Joanne said.
Dani only whimpered again.
"...I think I'm going to have to treat you like a baby." Joanne finished saying.

Joanne reached in her babysitter bag and took out a diaper. She usually carried one or two with her, but knew she could easily buy more at the drug store if she had to. She laid Danielle, who felt utterly powerless now, left naked and covered in her own urine, down on the floor. Carefully, she wiped the urine from Dani's body and got her into a thick, white disposable diaper. Dani closed her eyes, overcome with shame, and a couple tears escaped. Joanne completed the ensemble by tying a white and pink little bib around Danielle's neck. It did nothing to cover her bare undeveloped chest, but it did make her look far more babyish. joannes pinched her cheek and smiled.
"Aw, you look so much cuter now, don't you?" She said.
"S... stop it... I don't like this..." Danielle said.
Joanne laughed.
"Well, it IS a punishment. I'm going to humiliate and baby you the whole time your parents are out, treat you like the sweet little baby you are. Than, maybe when they get back, you Mommy and Daddy will find a nicer, more well behaved littler cutie, hm?" Joanne said.
She sat Dani up and pushed her out of the bathroom.
"I have to change out of this since you peed on me, but I'll be out in a second. Be a good baby girl, okay?" Joanne said.
