12131.content:
Danielle was 12, almost thirteen, actually. She had shoulder length brown hair, and smooth pale skin. Danielle felt like she was practically an adult now, since she had had her first period not long ago, and her tiny breasts were beginning to grow. She certainly felt like an adult, but she was still treated like a child everywhere she went.

It all began one mild summer day when Danielle's 17 year old cousin, Liz, was visiting from across town spending the night in the spare room. Danielle was home alone, since her mom trusted her enough to leave her home alone. Mom was working late.

Liz came down the stairs wearing her favorite party dress and carrying a (stolen) six pack of beer.
"Hey, Danielle, there's a party going on tonight. My friends from highschool are there. You can come along, but be cool about it, okay?" Liz said.
Danielle squealed with joy. She had always idolized her cousin Liz, and always wanted to go to a REAL party.
"Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!" Danielle said, hugging her cousin.
Liz laughed.
"Don't say I'm never nice to you, okay?" She said.
The two of them got into Liz's car (actually Liz's dad's car that he let her use) and went off to the house party.

When they arrived at the party, Danielle immediately went for the punch bowl. Not realizing it was alcoholic, she chugged a cup of it and then poured herself another. Liz went off to talk with her friends and socialize, while Danielle ran for the dance floor, which was actually just a cleared out dining room. The teenagers around her wondered what a kid like her was doing at the party, but no one seemed to care. Danielle was a great dancer, and the alcohol in her system somehow made her better. The crowd of highschoolers formed a circle around her to witness her fantastic moves. They clapped and cheered for her.
"That's my cousin! Woohoo!" Liz called out from the sidelines.

Danielle got tired after a while. She sat down on the couch between a popular cheerleader type girl and a stereotypical cool guy with a pointy haircut and a jacket without a shirt to show off his abs. The cheerleader girl turned to Danielle.
"You are AWESOME! Hey, how do you dance like that?" She asked.
Danielle smiled. This party was the most fun she had ever had.
"It comes naturally." Danielle said.
"hey, you know what, you deserve a beer. You can have the rest of my beer!" The girl said.

Danielle was handed a half-full can of beer, a cheap brand from a grocery store. Danielle was excited. She had never had beer before, but always wanted to try it. She tipped the can to her lips and drank some.
"This tastes yucky!" She happily said, smiling, like it was the awesomest thing in the world.
"I know, right! Hey, chug it so I can make a video of you! You'll be the beer girl on Youtube! You'll be famous!" The cheerleader girl said.

Danielle chugged the rest of the beer can as the other girl recorded it on her phone. After she was finished, Danielle let out a belch, and giggled.
"Beer's fun! I want another!" Danielle said.
"I'll go get you one!" The cheerleader said, excitedly.
The cheerleader girl was already a little tipsy, but Danielle, given her low body weight and the fact that he was unconditioned to alcohol, was already on the path to drunkenness. Danielle drank a little more beer while the tipsy cheerleader she had acquainted herself with ran off to dance with someone. Liz and her friends sat down next to Danielle in her place.

"Having fun, Danielle?" Liz asked.
Danielle smiled. "Bezzt day ob my liiiiiife!" She slurred.
Liz's friends laughed at her.
"Liz, your kid cousin's drunk." One of them said.
Liz laughed too.
"Yeah, but she's a cute drunk, isn't she?" Liz said.
Danielle started to drink a little more of her beer, but some of it went down the wrong pipe. She coughed, and then, feeling woozy, vomited all over her shirt.
"Oh... Oh, that' not good." Danielle said.
Danielle pulled off her messy shirt. Even though her tiny breasts were just starting to come in, she still wore a training bra underneath. The stinky vomit had seeped through that as well, so Danielle took that off too. The guys were starting to eye her. She was only twelve, but to them, tits were tits. She got a lot of funny stares. Liz took notice.
"I'd better take you home, Dani. You're drunk, and I want you back before one of my classmates decides to molest you." Liz said.
Danielle pushed Liz away.
"No way! This is the most fun I've ever had, and I won't let it end this early!" Danielle said. She chugged the rest of her beer, and tried to dramatically storm off. Instead, she hit her head on a wall and blacked out.

...
...
...

Danielle woke up some time later. It was late at night and she was left in a shopping cart in her front yard. Liz had left her like that so she could get back to partying. She was still rather drunk, and was still topless. Her shirt was nowhere to be found. She had also peed and pooped her pants, but the girl was too drunk to care. Danielle tried to get out of the shopping cart, but only stumbled. Her pants got caught on the side, and ripped from the waist all the way down her left leg. That was when Mom came home.

Danielle waved to her mom, smiling. To her, she was still partying, still having fun.
"Hi Mom!" Danielle said.
Mom was furious. Here she saw her twelve year old daughter topless, drunk ,and in a pair of ripped jeans and soiled panties left on her front lawn like a piece of trash. She carried Danielle inside, seething but silent. She took off Danielle's clothes and got a bath ready for her.
"How could you be so stupid, Danielle?!? This was Liz's doing wasn't it?" Mom growled.

It should be noted that Danielle's mom was a sadistic psycho-bitch. Secretly, she lived for moments like this when she could punish children. Danielle was usually on good behavior, but if she screwed up, her mom liked to come up with sadistic or bizarre and creative punishments for the girl. Already, her mind was reeling.

Danielle fell asleep again as her mother bathed and cleaned her. Mom thought it over for how to punish Danielle for running off with her cousin and getting drunk. Inspiration struck when Danielle farted in her sleep. Mom knew what was coming and quickly lifted her wet daughter onto the toilet just before fresh diarrhea exploded from the child's butt. Mom smiled an evil smile.

...
.,.
...

Danielle woke up the next day with a terrible hangover. Her head ached like nothing else.
"Well, at least I'm still in my bed. Someone must've taken me home." Danielle said.
She threw off the covers and realized she was wearing nothing but a diaper... and she had wet it!
"Oh my god! Why am I wearing a diaper?" Danielle shouted.
That was when Mom burst onto the scene. She had been waiting all morning for this.

"Ah, Danielle, you're awake. You must've had quite a night. Well, when I found you, you were half naked and sitting in a pool of your own filth, so I figured I'd put you in diapers for in case you made more filth. Might I add, you are far too young to be partying, especially with alcohol. You're grounded until further notice." Mom said, sternly.
"But Mom...." Danielle whined.
"No buts, Danielle! Also, as part of your punishment, you are forbidden from wearing anything but a diaper, and are forbidden from using the bathroom. You like running around topless in a pool of your own waste so much, I figured I'd force you." Mom said.
"You can't do that!" Danielle said.
Mom laughed at Danielle's defiance.
"Dani, you live under my roof, and as long as you do, I AM THE LAW! Now you are grounded and you will wear diapers and poop and pee in them, got it?" Mom said. Danielle reached for the tapes of her diaper to take it off. Mom grabbed her hand away, and whacked Danielle's bare thighs with a ruler.
"you want a beating? I'm more than happy to get out the paddle." mom said. Danielle knew this was no empty threat. She had been paddled before. Shamefully, she hung her head and nodded.
"Good, now it's time for breakfast." Mom said.
Mom grabbed Danielle by the hand and sat her down at the breakfast table. She tied a bib around Danielle's neck, although it was not long enough to cover the girl's bare nipples. Mom handed Danielle a spoon and reached into the refrigerator and got out...

Iâve tried to baby-proof, but I canât promise you might not hurt yourself if you manage to wiggle your way off on to the floor below. And we canât have that, can we punkin?â.          âYes you are the cutest little 12 year old baby! Itâs too bad itâs come to this, but I canât rely on you to be dependable at all, Dan-Dan. All you have to do is relax and go back to sleep until I get home! I promise you: first thing when I get home from my dance practice is untie baby Dan-Dan and get you cleaned-up (if necessary)â I whined back through the toy choking me, pleading with her to stay, despite this sadistic treatment, but equally fearful of being left totally alone and helpless like this for half the night! I already felt a familiar urgent need in my small bladder, and this was only heightened by the sudden honking of Stephanieâs rideâs car horn down below!

         âOkay, I gotta go! Now you be a good baby and donât make any doo-dooâs while your big sister is gone. Okay-dokey?â. Then she went to the door, and left me like that, in the dark atop my own bed, naked but for a diaper and some zip-ties. I told you Iâd get the little brat back for that stunt he pulled on us while we were sunbathing in the backyard last weekâ.

"I don't want to hear it, Daniel. Just...sit down for a moment," she interrupted with a stern and strong voice. You immediately shut up and followed her orders, taking your seat onto a couch. Your mother followed through by sitting next to you and putting a hand to your knee.

"Um...what are those for?" you hesitated but asked with confusion.

"They're for you, honey. I'm going to raise you again into a proper young man who won't ever go down the wrong path in life." she answered, her eyes serious.

Your eyes widened and you gaped at her with incredulous. You then chuckled, wondering if she was playing a cruel joke on you.

"I can sweetheart. You must think I'm being unreasonable here, but I can't risk my baby boy going somewhere I'll end up regretting. After talking to your principal, she was also supportive of this arrangement."

You snatched it away and read the contents, slowly turning white and moving into utter disbelief. This couldn't be real.


Dear Mrs. Jonathan,

As per the newly instated law that reduces risk of problematic and at-risk teenagers, you have been granted higher authority of guardianship to your son, Daniel Jonathan, for at least two years. During this period, Daniel will have limited rights regarding his well-being and any decision and responsibility will befall on you, the mother. Granted to you are the options to control your son's diet, physical well-being, and mental well-being in any environment.

Daniel's rights will be reinstated after two years automatically or early by parental request if deemed appropriate. A card will be provided with this letter proving to respective officials and authorities that you have necessary authority in your decisions against your son.

We hope the very best in your endeavor,
City of McGullen


Ah...that's right. This was put into law for about four years now. You haven't seen much of it being used and for the most part, forgot it ever existed! The program was apparently doing well as it had reduced potential problems about 30%.

You shakily removed the paper from your face and stared at the floor for a long time. You felt the paper being pulled away from your hand and replaced by a warm and petite hand, holding your hand.

You are shocked. She really thinks you are six years old. Do you really look that young? You do not know what you can say to defend yourself. You do not want to tell her that you are almost as old as she is. Quickly you put the pacifier back in your mouth and hug your stuffie tightly.

131331121131322111.content:
"I made a chart," Amber says looking down at you. "To help you grow up."

"A chart?" You ask. "What do you mean a chart?"

"A chart that will help you prove you are mature or really just a baby," Amber says as your father nods along.

"How can a chart do that?" You ask annoyed.

"The chart I made is on the wall over there!" Amber points while walking away from your father and the crib walking sensually showing off her white thong. "You probably might not be able to read it from there so I will explain."

"I think the chart is very fair." Your father chimes in looking at you. "Even you should."

You just look at your father wondering what the hell is going on.

"Anyway the chart works like this." As your stepmom walked back towards the crib looking at you.

"Every time you commit an immature act you lose an adult privilege. Every time you act mature your father or I will give you a good girl point. Every time you get 5 good girl points I or your father will select an adult privilege to give back. As of now since you were so immature today you will have some privileges lost. You can earn them back by showing you are a mature teenager and not an immature baby. To start off you are going to be diapered full time. You also lost the privilege to dress yourself. One of us will dress you every morning. We will pick what you wear. You lost the privilege to go potty by yourself so again you will have to ask us to take you. You lost the privelege to change your diaper yourself so we will for you. You lost the privilege to call us by anything but mommy and daddy now."

She stops and pauses looking for your reaction. You stare at her in shock. She can't be serious and somehow even your dad thinks this is fair!? You want to throw a tantrum but your father speaks up.

"Now that your mommy has explained what privileges you have lost I will explain what are considered immature acts. Throwing a tantrum, backtalking, using bad language not appropriate for children your age, using your diaper instead of the toilet this won't include sleep wettings, complaining about what outfit we pick for you, changing your diaper on your own, complaining about losing a privilege, and disobedience in general."

Your father looks at you. His intense gaze is almost scaring you.

"Do you understand Dani?" Dad asks you. "Is it clear?"

You nod yes.

"Good. Amber will explain how you can earn good girl points." Dad says looking over at Amber.

"Now if you show us you can be mature we will avoid you a good girl point. One thing that will earn you a good girl point is not going potty pants in your pants the whole day. Honestly, Danielle, shouldn't you be pottytrained yet? Aren't you ashamed?"

You blush looking down. She knew you couldn't control it was not your fault! She speaks up again to you though.

"Nothing to say about that? Well, let's continue. Next, you can earn a good girl point by not complaining or fighting all day. If you don't wet the bed at night while sleeping you will earn a good girl point. Let's be real about that though you wet yourself 9 out of 10 ten times while sleeping so you probably won't earn many points on that. We also won't punish you for sleep wetting like we will for daytime accidents. If you go a whole month without wetting yourself we will let you go back to pullups and give you 20 good girl points. If you go a month in pullups with no accidents you will auto regain all your privileges and the chart gets thrown out. We also let you try panties for once."

Your eyes went wide panties? For real? No more diapers? No more pullups? You find yourself involuntarily smile.

"Knew that would catch your interest, Danielle," Amber said smiling. "Wouldn't it be nice to dress your age for once? That being said if you lose every privilege on the chart you are going to be our baby permanently. The chart will be thrown away and you will have proven yourself a baby once and for all. There are quite a few more privileges though so you would pretty much purposely have to be a baby to lose them all."

You really don't like the sound of that. In fact, you start feeling enraged. You are a teenager you shouldn't have to deal with any of this crap anyway.

"So does it sound like a deal?" Dad asked. "Sound fair?"

Your aunt Tanya just dropped you off at her house. You were going to be spending the entire summer with her while your parents were overseas. Early this morning she picked you up from the airport. Your luggage was lost by the airlines so you wouldn't have anything to wear until they found it. Luckily your aunt promised to buy you some new clothes when she got back. She was out meeting with an out of town friend that she had promised months ago to meet with. Long before she knew you were spending the summer with her. She had taken your 5 year old cousin Abbie with her as her friend also had a young child. As you had one been in the house less than a minute you decided to explore the home and look for your room.

Finding the hall containing the bedrooms you found your cousin's childish room and walked to another room. Must be the master bedroom you thought. At the end of the hall you found what you believed to be the guest room. It looked nice but you were curious what was in the remaining room. Upon opening the door you were a little shocked.

It looked like a room that a toddler or baby would have pink walls with a white crib inside and a changing table. Basically everything else a toddler would need was also in there. Almost as if hypnotized you find yourself walking into the room and closing the door behind you. You freeze as you notice some disposable diapers in the shelf on the changing table. You try to force yourself to look elsewhere but feel increasingly compelled to keep looking as you walk towards the table. Grabbing a diaper something in your stomach feels odd. Placing the diaper on table on the changing table you find yourself taking off your very adult lacy thong. Your sandals long since taken off when you first entered the house. Shuddering as your bare bottom lied against the padding of the table you grab some baby powder and powder your diaper area. Next you find yourself taping up the diaper. Somehow this felt...right. Getting off the table you walk over to full sized mirror admiring your teen body wearing the babyish garment. Thinking that something was missing you soon find a pacifier in the room and plop it into your mouth. Beginning to suckle the pacifier you make your way back to the mirror. Viewing your reflection you think much better. Spotting the crib you wonder if you will fit. If the diaper fits surely you must fit in the crib you begin thinking. Wandering over to the crib you hop in and fit.

As you sit in the crib suckling the pacifier you suddenly realize you probably should not be doing this. What if Tanya caught you like this? How would she respond? You are not sure why you allowed your curiosity to allow you to place yourself in this situation. Even worse you feel the need to pee. Having not gone pee all day has not helped. 151131.content:
Entering the kitchen, you gasp as you see your mother awaiting you with a cup of tea at her side.

Preview  

"Whoa! M-mom? I...I didn't know you were coming!"

Her expression is serious, unlike someone who is happy to see her son after separating and living alone for a few months. Something about it makes you anxious and you gulp, wondering now what could be the problem. In a way though...you kind of know why.

"I've tried calling..."

"Ah...yeah, I've been busy."

One of her eyebrows raises. "So busy that you can't even pick up the phone for your own mother when she calls? Do you know how worried I've been?"

Feeling ashamed, you try to defend yourself and apologize at the same time. "I've been meaning to call you back, but everything's just been so..."

"...busy? Oh, I know about that and it's your own fault too!"

"Huh?"

You furrow your eyebrows, confused. Honestly, every day you've been coming home late and always going to directly to bed. It's one of the reasons the calls have been going unanswered.

"H-how is it my fault?! Look, I'm sorry and especially that you had to come here just to check up on me, but...I'm fine okay! You and dad don't need to worry about me!"

"But we do!" she snaps.

The mood grows silence and any protest you had left in you dies with it. You can't help but lower your head.

Closing your eyes, your mother explains her presence in more detail. "To be honest, I've been keeping a close eye on you. I know you must feel proud to gain a job and live independently for the first time, but guess what? It doesn't mean you can just work yourself to death and stop caring for your own health!"

You sigh. "Mom, I'm-"

"I'm not done!" she snaps again and you close your lips.

"Let's look at what you have in the cabinets first and I think that will explain itself."

You start paling and when she opens the first door, there's nothing but a bunch of precooked meals and ramen. None of which should be considered to be eaten all the time.

"Ramen, really? Of all things, you're satisfied which just eating this junk and ramen!?"

You clear your throat but don't say anything else.

"...but above all else, the CEO of your company called me. By the way, if you think you got in because of your own merits, think again! I convinced the top management to hire you. She told me you are a hard worker, which I'm proud of...but she also tells me that you fucking willingly stay overtime! Why?! This workaholic shit is what killed your uncle!"

"I..."

"Say no more, Jonathan!" she hushes, "...I can't leave you alone anymore and clearly, you can't take care of yourself properly so I'm going to start taking care of you."

Tired and in disbelief, you start chuckling. "Oh mom, I'm not your baby anymore. I'm not going just let you do this. I'm tired okay, so just...sleep in my room and I'll sleep on the couch. That's all."

This is still your mother and you don't intend to throw her out or anything like that. Yet, you are old enough to make your stand. Unfortunately...

"...no, that's not all. If you don't believe me about what I said with my connection with the CEO, then think again. You'll receive a call soon."

Your furrow your eyebrows. "What are you talking-"

Just as she says that, your cell phone rings. Your mother closes her eyes and takes a sip of tea, moving to sit on the table.

You frown and then look at the caller ID on your work phone. To your surprise, it is the CEO, Nancy. Suddenly, you start feeling some sweat on your back.

Clearing your throat and pretending to be more lively, you answer the call. "Hi Nancy!"

Her voice is clear on the other line and sounding rather unamused. "Jonathan, I'm going to make this quick. Your mother came to your apartment, right?"

You start sweating more and give out a worried chuckle. "Um...y-yeah?"

Her response is prompt. "Listen to her or your fired."

The line disconnected as Nancy ended the call and you are left frozen while your mother sips her tea, everything going according to her plan. She begins speaking while you stare blankly ahead.

"This is for your own good. From today onward, you will refer to me as Mommy. We'll be sleeping together in the same bed, I'll be nursing you several hours a day, feeding you, and you will start wearing diapers. You will become as close to a baby until I feel you are ready to grow up. Is that understood?"

You are at a loss for words as your mouth hangs open. The cell phone is still against your ears as you try to process this whole situation.

What do you do?

Good morning all,

Today, I'd like to make a few announcements. I want to first introduce a new HR that will be joining us today.

Her name is Maria and she happens to be also Daniel's mother. Everyone, please welcome her with wide arms as she works to improve our company culture and make sure everyone is taken care of.

Do not be surprised when you see him wearing nothing but diapers and fed by his Mommy Maria. This effort and lifestyle change are meant to ensure we help Daniel to relieve stress. I'd like everyone to support Daniel whenever you see him.

On that note, one thing we will not tolerate is letting our employees overwork themselves. Everyone should know we make sure that our environment is productive, but at the same time, flexible. The one thing we do not want to encourage is continuous over time, even if it helps the company's bottom line.

To that end, let's celebrate everyone's achievements with a happy hour at 3 P.M. See you there!

Nancy

info.brief_description: You are caught doing something you aren't supposed to and are punished by being diapered
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please join our Google Group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/thicklypadded

You are caught misbehaving and your punishment is to be put back into diapers and forced to use them.

This interactive has a large number of possible stories (defined by the first 4 choices) most of these will probably never be written so I will link from here to the stories which have been started.

Credil has already started one:
http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1920943-Diaper-Punishment/map/1322
You are an 16-year-old boy named Daniel. Your girlfriend Stephanie will punish you by putting you back into diapers and dressing you like a girl.

And I have started 3:
http://www.writing.com/main/interact/cid/1540506
You are a 24-year-old man named Daniel, married to a woman named Stephanie. Sephanie's mother, Harriet, will punish you by putting you back into diapers and dressing you like a girl.

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/cid/1538589
You are an 8-year-old boy named Daniel. Joanne, your babysitter will punish you by putting you back into diapers.

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/cid/1539346
You are a 20-year-old lesbian named Danielle. Stephanie, your girlfriend will punish you by putting you back into diapers.

If you are adding please keep new chapters in the style of a Choose-Your-Own-Adventure book. It is written as though the story is happening to the reader and the choices are decisions that their character can make.
